[CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Hitsplat is a 317 Economy server. The server is lead by mature & fully dedicated team. We have an awesome staff team who is always available to help you. Hitsplat offers you a widespread content all around the map featuring different Achievements to complete. At Hitsplat, We strive for a perfect gaming experience & even the smallest details are important to us. Our key is to provide as bug-free and as enjoyable content as possible![/SIZE][/ADMIN][/FONT]
[URL=http://"http://hitsplat.org/Hitsplat.jar"]Download the Latest client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://hitsplat.org/vote"]Vote for Hitsplat[/URL] [URL=http://"http://hitsplat.org/"]Visit Hitsplat Forums[/URL]
[SPOILER=View Features] [B]- Features -[/B] Loading 602 Data with 474 Maps Fullscreen/Resizable/Fixed F-Keys Zooming Vote System Auto Donate Awesome Donator benefit All skills working Active community Frequent Updates Stable / No Lag Perfected Slayer system. Flawless combat Helpful & Active staff Good economy Good drop rates [B]- Bosses - [/B] Godwars KBD Dagannoths Kalphite Queen Chaos Elemental Tormented Demons Chaos Elemental Barrelchest Kraken Mithril Dragons Callisto Venenatis Scorpia Vet'ion Giant Sea snake [B]- Minigames -[/B] Barrows Pest control Duel arena Jad Minigame Warriors Guild Barbarian Assault [/SPOILER]
